about_the_game:
This is a unique 2D platforming jumping puzzle plus story game. Players take on the role of a frustrated photographer who embarks on a journey in search of the "most beautiful scenery" after signing a "contract" with a demon. Finally, at the end of the journey, try again the dream and original intention.

There are two game routes in the game: the puzzle route and the story route. In the puzzle route, players can platform jumps, trigger traps, carry chests, and more in the level. The most important of these is our core item, the camera. When the player holds the camera, the game camera moves with the player. When the player presses the "F" key to drop the camera, the screen is stationary, and the player can travel from one side of the screen to the other to enter some special passage to find the key to decryption. There is also a set of collectibles for players to set up, so smart players can find them as much as they want!

In the story route, players can immerse themselves in the story and feel the various people and things that the protagonist encounters along the way. After meeting Grandpa Hua and Uncle Hu's family, what kind of stories and feelings will they bring to the protagonist? For more content, please visit the in-game experience.
detailed_description:
This is a unique 2D platforming jumping puzzle plus story game. Players take on the role of a frustrated photographer who embarks on a journey in search of the "most beautiful scenery" after signing a "contract" with a demon. Finally, at the end of the journey, try again the dream and original intention.

There are two game routes in the game: the puzzle route and the story route. In the puzzle route, players can platform jumps, trigger traps, carry chests, and more in the level. The most important of these is our core item, the camera. When the player holds the camera, the game camera moves with the player. When the player presses the "F" key to drop the camera, the screen is stationary, and the player can travel from one side of the screen to the other to enter some special passage to find the key to decryption. There is also a set of collectibles for players to set up, so smart players can find them as much as they want!

In the story route, players can immerse themselves in the story and feel the various people and things that the protagonist encounters along the way. After meeting Grandpa Hua and Uncle Hu's family, what kind of stories and feelings will they bring to the protagonist? For more content, please visit the in-game experience.

name: Contract Album

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window7
  • Processor: i3-1305U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window11
  • Processor: 15-12600H
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 Ti
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: The protagonist experiences a career failure and is guided by a "demon" to embark on a journey again. Players will solve puzzles through the camera and discover forgotten memories on their journey. At the end of the story, the protagonist will find his "most beautiful scenery".
